content: 2 2 single_crochet in 1st st 4 single_crochet in blo decrease in bphdc decrease in blo single_crochet in blo 2 single_crochet in last st blo bphdc around half_double_crochet from previous row chain 1 turn 9 decrease in blo 4 single_crochet in blo 2 single_crochet in last st chain 1 row 9 single_crochet in 1st st single_crochet in blo decrease in blo turn 15 fphdc decrease in blo single_crochet in blo single_crochet in last st chain row 3 single_crochet in 1st st 4 single_crochet in blo decrease in 1 turn 7 blo fphdc decrease in blo 4 single_crochet in blo single_crochet in row 10 2 single_crochet in 1st st decrease in blo bphdc last st chain 1 turn 13 decrease in blo 2 single_crochet in last st chain 1 turn 7 row 4 2 single_crochet in 1st st 3 single_crochet in blo decrease in row 11 single_crochet in 1st st decrease in blo fphdc blo bphdc decrease in blo 3 single_crochet in blo 2 single_crochet in decrease in blo single_crochet in last st chain 1 turn 5 last st chain 1 turn 13 row 12 decrease bphdc decrease chain 1 turn 3 row 5 single_crochet in 1st st 3 single_crochet in blo decrease in row 13 sc3tog 1 blo fphdc decrease in blo 3 single_crochet in blo single_crochet in fasten_off and weave in ends last st chain 1 turn 11 star setup make a mc chain 1 fasten_off and weave in starting tail leave round 1 single_crochet double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet 5 times in mc the other tail long for sewing the star onto pull mc closed sl to 1st st to join the tree © 2024 jay s fiber studio 2 yuletide tree crochet assembly & finishing if desired embroider details onto the star and tree in the included photo i ve added a starburst design in a different color to the star and use a variegated color with french knots to create a look of ornaments or lights these details were embroidered with a single strand rather than held double giving a finer level of detail you may also add sequins or beads for texture and sparkle if desired with both right sides facing up use the tail from the star to sew it onto the top of the tree weave in all ends if using as an ornament or tag you can place a hanger loop or fastener through the top point of the star you may not sell or reproduce this pattern without express written permission you may sell any items you create based on this pattern please credit jay s fiber studio in your listing i would love to see your creations tag me or use the hashtag #scarfofmanyminis let s connect tiktok @jayysenn jay s fiber studio instagram @jayysenn ravelry @jayysenn © 2024 jay s fiber studio 3
